message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer is a great deal for you in the early rounds.
I think this is a fair split, Alice.  We both get a decent amount, and it avoids unnecessary rounds of negotiation.
Bob, time is money, literally! Let's be realistic. This is a good deal for both of us considering the inflation.
Alice, this is my final offer.  With inflation, each round is getting more costly for me.  This offer ensures we both get a substantial share before the money loses too much value.
Bob, you're running out of time! This is my last significant offer. Take it before inflation eats away at your share even more.
